meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Gratz Alex Marchyshyn Genaro Lopez Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6057.

td.p: Steve Gratz, a freelance artist from Washington, D.C.
Alex Marchyshyn, a recent college graduate from Charlotte, North Carolina
Genaro Lopez, a contract administrator from Portland, Oregon (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,001)

tr.td: I'M MELTING
TENNIS VOCABULARY, ANYONE?
WHAT'S THE USE
ALWAYS IN FASHION
3 AGAINST 1
(Alex: Each correct response will be 4 letters long, but 3 of them will be exactly the same.)
MARXISMS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Alex: Shelf or glacier. Yes)

the ice shelf

Steve
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Scientists worry about the fast melting of these Antarctic bodies, like the vast body called the Pine Island this')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Scientists worry about the fast melting of these Antarctic bodies, like the vast body called the Pine Island this

Of the 9 presidents whose images have a beard or mustache, this late 19th century man is the only Democrat
Genaro
Alex
Steve
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $12,399
Genaro
Alex
Steve

4 R,
3 W

20 R
(including 3 DDs),
3 W
